wikipedia_page.main: Benjamin Ross Evans (born 31 July 1975) is a former international Wales rugby union player. A prop, he has played for Ospreys, Cardiff Blues and Calvisano. He has played for Jersey and Moseley RFC. After spending time playing amateur rugby for Waverley Rugby Club in Sydney, Australia, Ben is now the Scrummaging and set piece coach at the Parramatta Two Blues
